name: Giraffe Town (itch)
description:
Take control of a giraffe who has had enough of being held back in life by his weird feet as you slide your way through the town in a courageous pursuit of love.

Experience:

  • Motivation
  • Determination
  • Dedication
  • Devastation
  • Frustration
  • Elimination

Welcome to Giraffe Town...

– Giraffe Town –
